Error.title: Something went wrong!
Error.description: We unfortunately ran into an error. You can try to reload the page you were visiting.

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Please check the URL in the address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.

LanguageDetection.title: Language detected
LanguageDetection.description: We detected a different language. Do you want to switch?

cookie-banner.description-1: In order to provide you with audience measurement statistics, we may place third-party cookies on your device. This can only be done with your prior consent for each of these cookies.

HomePage.title: Creating web interfaces with Next.js
HomePage.description: Unlock seamless web design with our expert Next.js solutions—crafted for precision and excellence.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect and use your information.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us:

cookie-policy.title: Cookie Policy
cookie-policy.intro: Any cookies that may be used come from third-party applications and are subject to their own policies, which can be accessed when using these services.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.intro: We use the information we collect to:

security.title: Data Security
security.intro: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.intro: For any questions regarding privacy, please do not hesitate to contact me:

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.intro: We may update this policy from time to time. Please review it periodically.

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.intro: Welcome to our service. By using our website, you agree to these terms.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.intro: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this agreement.

responsibilities.title: 2. User Responsibilities
responsibilities.security: Maintain the security of your account

changes.title: 3. Service Changes
changes.update: Update these terms at any time

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions regarding these terms, please do not hesitate to contact us:

AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.description: Learn more about our project and our mission.
AboutPage.content: This project is a modern Next.js starter kit, designed to help you build fast, scalable, and maintainable web applications.
